title: PM Modi congratulates Tarique Rahman on BNP’s decisive win in Bangladesh elections
content:
Here's a summary in 3 bullet points based *only* on the provided headline:

*   PM Modi congratulated Tarique Rahman.
*   The congratulation was for the Bangladesh Nationalist Party (BNP).
*   This was in response to the BNP's "decisive win" in the Bangladesh elections.

title: T.N. CM Stalin’s surprise bonanza for women: ₹5,000 credited in bank accounts of 1.31 crore women today
content:
Tamil Nadu Chief Minister M.K. Stalin initiated a surprise financial aid program for women.
*   Under the scheme, ₹5,000 was credited directly into the bank accounts of beneficiaries.
*   A total of 1.31 crore (13.1 million) women received the funds today.

title: As multilateralism erodes, India must reframe its foreign policy
content:
Here are 3 bullet points summarizing the headline:

*   Multilateralism, or global cooperation, is currently experiencing a decline.
*   This erosion necessitates a fundamental re-evaluation of India's foreign policy.
*   India must strategically adapt its approach to international relations to navigate this changing world order.

title: VB-G RAM G: when a policy shift meets rural realities
content:
A policy shift concerning 'VB-G RAM G' is taking place.
*   This change is specifically being observed in the context of rural areas.
*   The headline suggests potential challenges, adaptations, or unique outcomes as the policy encounters the practical realities of rural life.

title: Southern Railway installs digital display boards but without real time data of arrival of suburban trains
content:
Here's the summary in 3 bullet points:

*   Southern Railway has installed new digital display boards.
*   Crucially, these boards currently lack real-time arrival data.
*   This means suburban train arrival information is not displayed live.

title: TVK functionary among 52 persons booked in Vandavasi for obstruction of traffic movement
content:
A total of 52 persons have been booked by authorities.
*   Among those booked is a functionary from the TVK party.
*   The individuals were booked in Vandavasi for obstructing traffic movement.

title: Politicians misuse of social media, need to act in such cases: J&K Minister Sakina Itoo
content:
J&K Minister Sakina Itoo has raised concerns about the misuse of social media by politicians.
*   She emphasized the urgent need for action to be taken in response to such cases.
*   The statement calls for accountability and intervention regarding political conduct on digital platforms.

title: Minister’s adverse remarks in Rajasthan Assembly on right to health spark controversy
content:
A Minister made "adverse remarks" during a session in the Rajasthan Assembly.
*   These comments specifically concerned the fundamental "right to health."
*   The Minister's statements immediately sparked significant controversy.

title: Orissa High Court directs State Government to tally Puri Jagannath temple’s jewellery inventoried in 1978
content:
Here's the summary in 3 bullet points:

*   The Orissa High Court has directed the State Government.
*   The directive is to tally the jewellery of the Puri Jagannath Temple.
*   This tally must be compared against the temple's jewellery inventory from 1978.

title: Over 73% of MoUs converted into investments in T.N., says Stalin
content:
Over 73% of Memorandums of Understanding (MoUs) signed in Tamil Nadu have successfully translated into actual investments.
*   This indicates a high conversion rate of agreements into tangible projects within the state.
*   The statistic was announced by Chief Minister M.K. Stalin.
